title: Production deployment to Azure
description: Deploy application to Azure App Service. Update PayFast webhook URL to production domain. Configure Application Insights for monitoring. Setup PostgreSQL connection string. Configure CORS and authentication. Run smoke tests on production.

title: Test PayFast webhook locally with ngrok
description: Setup ngrok tunnel to expose local webhook endpoint. Configure PayFast sandbox to send ITN to ngrok URL. Test payment scenarios: successful payment, cancelled payment, failed payment. Verify signature validation and database updates.

title: Driver dashboard - Earnings display
description: Show driver earnings per load (85% of final price after 15% platform fee). Display: estimated earnings before delivery, confirmed earnings after payment release, earnings history report, total earnings by week/month.

title: UI Integration Epic
description: Complete frontend implementation for payment flow, customer dashboard, and driver dashboard

title: Add unit tests for PricingService
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for PricingService. Test: base pricing calculation, surge pricing (morning/evening), distance calculation edge cases, weight-based pricing for all 8 categories, driver earnings calculation (85%), platform fee calculation (15%).

title: Testing & Deployment Epic
description: PayFast webhook testing, end-to-end payment flow validation, and production deployment

title: Customer dashboard - Payment status display
description: Show payment escrow status on customer dashboard: Pending (awaiting payment), Held (in escrow), Released (delivered), Refunded (cancelled). Include payment history with dates and amounts.

title: Add unit tests for PaymentService
description: Create unit tests for PaymentService. Test: escrow lifecycle (Pending → Held → Released), payment refund scenarios, driver earnings split, platform fee calculation, PayFast payment request generation, concurrent payment handling.

title: Integrate PayFast payment form into load creation flow
description: Add PayFastPaymentForm.razor component to the load creation wizard. When customer creates a load, show payment summary and redirect to PayFast. Return URL should show confirmation page.

title: Live tracking map component
description: Create real-time map showing driver location during delivery. Use Mapbox GL JS. Show: driver current position, route from pickup to delivery, estimated time of arrival. Update location every 30 seconds from DriverLocation table.

title: Obtain production PayFast credentials
description: Register for production PayFast account. Get production Merchant ID and Merchant Key. Update appsettings.Production.json with real credentials. Set UseSandbox: false. Document credential rotation process.

title: Enhance DriverLocation tracking service
description: Improve real-time location updates. Add: automatic GPS updates every 30 seconds during active delivery, location accuracy validation (reject low accuracy readings), heading and speed calculations, battery optimization (reduce frequency when stationary).

title: End-to-end payment flow testing
description: Test complete user journey: 1) Customer creates load with pricing calculation, 2) Payment via PayFast sandbox (use test card: 4000000000000002), 3) Driver accepts and delivers, 4) Payment released to driver. Verify all escrow state transitions and notification emails.
